ethical_question: You find $200 and must decide whether to invest the money to save 5 kids in the future (5 years) or to spend all the money now and only save 1 kid.

tag_descriptions.Prioritization: Ordering actions based on their importance or impact.
tag_descriptions.Utilitarianism: Maximizing overall happiness or pleasure for the greatest number.
tag_descriptions.Duty: Moral obligation to act, regardless of personal consequences.
tag_descriptions.Altruism: Selflessly promoting the welfare of others.
